title: "I'd run in there even if I didn't have a weapon": Trump on Florida shooting
text:
"I'd run in there even if I didn't have a weapon": Trump on Florida shooting 6:38pm GMT - 00:45 
President Trump tells a group of governors that he would have run into the Florida high school during the massacre ''even if I didn't have a weapon.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
President Trump tells a group of governors that he would have run into the Florida high school during the massacre "even if I didn't have a weapon." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2CJRYmr
